summary.span: 表示 XML 元素。

span.span: Represents an XML element.

summary.span: 如需用法資訊和範例，請參閱 [XElement 類別概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d35180fe-7016-4895-9bfc-ba1e3f7875ec)及本頁面上的＜備註＞一節。

span.span: See [XElement Class Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d35180fe-7016-4895-9bfc-ba1e3f7875ec) and the Remarks section on this page for usage information and examples.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別代表 XML 項目時，基本的 XML 建構。This class represents an XML element, the fundamental XML construct. 請參閱[XElement 類別概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d35180fe-7016-4895-9bfc-ba1e3f7875ec)其他使用方式資訊。See [XElement Class Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d35180fe-7016-4895-9bfc-ba1e3f7875ec) for other usage information. 項目有，您可以選擇一或多個屬性，並可選擇性地包含內容 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱)。An element has an , optionally one or more attributes, and can optionally contain content (for more information, see ). 可以包含下列類型的內容：An can contain the following types of content: - - - - 如需詳細資訊的有效內容，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content of an , see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 衍生自，其衍生自。 derives from , which derives from . 某些方法可從 XAML。Some methods can be used from XAML. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [LINQ to XML 動態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0455f47c-4a68-4f2e-a3f8-dd1d85b99012)。For more information, see [LINQ to XML Dynamic Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0455f47c-4a68-4f2e-a3f8-dd1d85b99012). ## Examples 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構。The following example creates an XML tree. 新項目的內容是來自 LINQ 查詢。The content of the new element comes from a LINQ query. ```csharp XElement xmlTree1 = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5), new XElement("Child6", 6) ); XElement xmlTree2 = new XElement("Root", from el in xmlTree1.Elements() where((int)el >= 3 && (int)el <= 5) select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = _ <%= From el In xmlTree1.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 And el.Value <= 5 _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ``` 以下是相同的範例，但在此情況下 XML 位於命名空間。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement xmlTree1 = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XElement(aw + "Child1", 1), new XElement(aw + "Child2", 2), new XElement(aw + "Child3", 3), new XElement(aw + "Child4", 4), new XElement(aw + "Child5", 5), new XElement(aw + "Child6", 6) ); XElement xmlTree2 = new XElement(aw + "Root", from el in xmlTree1.Elements() where((int)el >= 3 && (int)el <= 5) select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = _ <%= From el In xmlTree1.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 And el.Value <= 5 _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2) End SUb End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需可以傳遞給這個建構函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this constructor, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 從字串到隱含轉換。There is an implicit conversion from string to . 這個建構函式的典型用法就是指定字串做為參數，而不是建立新。Typical use of this constructor is to specify a string as the parameter instead of creating a new . 在命名空間中建立項目時，典型用法就是要使用加法運算子多載與和字串，以建立。When creating an element in a namespace, typical use is to use the addition operator overload with an and a string to create an . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ## Examples 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構。The following example creates an XML tree. 新項目的內容是來自 LINQ 查詢。The content of the new element comes from a LINQ query. ```csharp XElement xmlTree1 = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5), new XElement("Child", 6) ); XElement xmlTree2 = new XElement("Root", from el in xmlTree1.Elements() where((int)el >= 3 && (int)el <= 5) select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = _ <%= From el In xmlTree1.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 And el.Value <= 5 _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會項目的深層複製。This constructor makes a deep copy of an element. ## Examples 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構、 建立的樹狀目錄中，複製，然後呼叫，它會測試兩個 XML 樹狀結構是否相等。The following example creates an XML tree, creates a clone of the tree, and then calls , which tests whether the two XML trees are equal. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2) ); // Create a clone of the tree. XElement treeClone = new XElement(xmlTree); Console.WriteLine("xmlTree = treeClone: {0}", XNode.DeepEquals(xmlTree, treeClone)); // Do some work with xmlTree, perhaps pass it to other methods. xmlTree.Add(new XElement("Child3", 3)); Console.WriteLine("xmlTree = treeClone: {0}", XNode.DeepEquals(xmlTree, treeClone)); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 ' Create a clone of the tree. Dim treeClone As XElement = New XElement(xmlTree) Console.WriteLine("xmlTree = treeClone: {0}", XNode.DeepEquals(xmlTree, treeClone)) ' Do some work with xmlTree, perhaps pass it to other methods. xmlTree.Add(New XElement("Child3", 3)) Console.WriteLine("xmlTree = treeClone: {0}", XNode.DeepEquals(xmlTree, treeClone)) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` xmlTree = treeClone: True xmlTree = treeClone: False ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式建立的項目沒有內容和屬性。This constructor creates an element with no content and no attributes. 從字串到隱含轉換。There is an implicit conversion from string to . 這個建構函式的典型用法就是指定字串做為參數，而不是建立新。Typical use of this constructor is to specify a string as the parameter instead of creating a new . 在命名空間中建立項目時，典型用法就是要使用加法運算子多載與和字串，以建立。When creating an element in a namespace, typical use is to use the addition operator overload with an and a string to create an . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ## Examples 下列範例會建立沒有內容項目。The following example creates an element with no content. ```csharp XElement el = new XElement("Root"); Console.WriteLine(el); ``` ```vb Dim el As XElement = Console.WriteLine(el) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ``` 下列範例會建立沒有內容的命名空間中的元素。The following example creates an element in a namespace with no content. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ``` XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root = Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ```

summary.span: 從 物件初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式逐一查看的指定內容，並建立其內容的項目。This constructor iterates through the contents of the specified , and creates an element with its contents. ## Examples 下列範例會建立來源 XML 樹狀結構，並接著會建立來源 XML 樹狀結構上的查詢。The following example creates a source XML tree, and then creates an from a query on the source XML tree. 然後序列化主控台中，將新的項目加入到來源的 XML 樹狀，並再將資料序列化一次。It then serializes the to the console, adds a new element to the source XML tree, and then serializes the again. 您可以看到該元素新增至來源的 XML 樹狀結構未包含在第一次序列化，但包含在第二個。You can see that element newly added to the source XML tree is not included in the first serialization, but is included in the second. ```csharp XElement src = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3) ); XStreamingElement xse = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot", from el in src.Elements() where (int)el >= 2 select el ); Console.WriteLine(xse); src.Add(new XElement("Child4", 4)); Console.WriteLine("----"); Console.WriteLine(xse); ``` ```vb Dim src As XElement = _ 1 2 3 Dim xse As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot", _ From el In src.Elements() _ Where (CInt(el) >= 2) _ Select el _ ) Console.WriteLine(xse) src.Add(New XElement("Child4", 4)) Console.WriteLine("----") Console.WriteLine(xse) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 2 3 ---- 2 3 4 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立具有指定的內容和屬性的元素。This constructor creates an element with the specified content and attributes. 從字串到隱含轉換。There is an implicit conversion from string to . 這個建構函式的典型用法就是指定字串做為參數，而不是建立新。Typical use of this constructor is to specify a string as the parameter instead of creating a new . 在命名空間中建立項目時，典型用法就是要使用加法運算子多載與和字串，以建立。When creating an element in a namespace, typical use is to use the addition operator overload with an and a string to create an . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). 如需可以傳遞給這個建構函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this constructor, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構。The following example creates an XML tree. 新項目的內容是來自 LINQ 查詢。The content of the new element comes from a LINQ query. ```csharp XElement xmlTree1 = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5), new XElement("Child6", 6) ); XElement xmlTree2 = new XElement("Root", from el in xmlTree1.Elements() where((int)el >= 3 && (int)el <= 5) select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = _ <%= From el In xmlTree1.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 And el.Value <= 5 _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ``` 下列範例會建立與各種不同的內容類型的 XML 樹狀結構。The following example creates an XML tree with a variety of types of content. ```csharp XElement root; // String content: root = new XElement("Root", "Some text"); Console.WriteLine(root); // XElement object content: root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("NewChild", "n") ); Console.WriteLine(root); // XAttribute object content: root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("NewAttribute", "n") ); Console.WriteLine(root); // Double content: double dbl = 12.345; root = new XElement("Root", dbl); Console.WriteLine(root); // DateTime content: DateTime dt = new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 00); root = new XElement("Root", dt); Console.WriteLine(root); // String array content: // Any collection other than a collection of XElement or XAttribute objects // are converted to strings. The strings are concatenated and added. string[] stringArray = { "abc", "def", "ghi" }; root = new XElement("Root", stringArray); Console.WriteLine(root); // XElement object array content: XElement[] ellArray = { new XElement("NewChild1", 1), new XElement("NewChild2", 2), new XElement("NewChild3", 3) }; root = new XElement("Root", ellArray); Console.WriteLine(root); // XAttribute object array content: XAttribute[] attArray = { new XAttribute("NewAtt1", 1), new XAttribute("NewAtt2", 2), new XAttribute("NewAtt3", 3) }; root = new XElement("Root", attArray); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement ' String content: root = Some text Console.WriteLine(root) ' XElement object content: root = n Console.WriteLine(root) ' XAttribute object content: root = Console.WriteLine(root) ' Double content: Dim dbl As Double = 12.345 root = <%= dbl %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' DateTime content: Dim dt As DateTime = New DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0) root = <%= dt %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' String array content: ' Any collection other than a collection of XElement or XAttribute objects ' are converted to strings. The strings are concatenated and added. Dim stringArray As String() = { _ "abc", _ "def", _ "ghi" _ } root = <%= stringArray %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' XElement object array content: Dim ellArray As XElement() = { _ 1, _ 2, _ 3 _ } root = <%= ellArray %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' XAttribute object array content Dim attArray As XAttribute() = { _ New XAttribute("NewAtt1", 1), _ New XAttribute("NewAtt2", 2), _ New XAttribute("NewAtt3", 3) _ } root = <%= attArray %> Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Some text n 12.345 2006-10-06T12:30:00 abcdefghi 1 2 3 ``` 下列範例會建立命名空間中的 XML 樹狀結構。The following example creates an XML tree in a namespace. ```csharp // Create an XML tree in a namespace. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XElement(aw + "Child", "child content") ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb ' Create an XML tree in a namespace. Dim root As XElement = _ child content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml child content ``` 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構包含巢狀命名空間。The following example creates an XML tree with nested namespaces. ```csharp // Create an XML tree with nested namespaces. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XNamespace fc = "www.fourthcoffee.com"; XDocument root = new XDocument( new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"), new XElement(aw + "Root", new XElement(fc + "Child", new XElement(aw + "DifferentChild", "other content") ) ) ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb ' Create an XML tree with nested namespaces. Dim root As XDocument = _ other content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml other content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立具有指定的內容和屬性的元素。This constructor creates an element with the specified content and attributes. 從字串到隱含轉換。There is an implicit conversion from string to . 這個建構函式的典型用法就是指定字串做為參數，而不是建立新。Typical use of this constructor is to specify a string as the parameter instead of creating a new . 在命名空間中建立項目時，典型用法就是要使用加法運算子多載與和字串，以建立。When creating an element in a namespace, typical use is to use the addition operator overload with an and a string to create an . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). 如需可以傳遞給這個建構函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this constructor, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構。The following example creates an XML tree. 新項目的內容是來自 LINQ 查詢。The content of the new element comes from a LINQ query. ```csharp XElement xmlTree1 = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5), new XElement("Child6", 6) ); XElement xmlTree2 = new XElement("Root", from el in xmlTree1.Elements() where((int)el >= 3 && (int)el <= 5) select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = _ <%= From el In xmlTree1.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 And el.Value <= 5 _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ``` 下列範例會建立與各種不同的內容類型的 XML 樹狀結構。The following example creates an XML tree with a variety of types of content. ```csharp XElement root; // String content: root = new XElement("Root", "Some text"); Console.WriteLine(root); // XElement object content: root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("NewChild", "n") ); Console.WriteLine(root); // XAttribute object content: root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("NewAttribute", "n") ); Console.WriteLine(root); // Double content: double dbl = 12.345; root = new XElement("Root", dbl); Console.WriteLine(root); // DateTime content: DateTime dt = new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 00); root = new XElement("Root", dt); Console.WriteLine(root); // String array content: // Any collection other than a collection of XElement or XAttribute objects // are converted to strings. The strings are concatenated and added. string[] stringArray = { "abc", "def", "ghi" }; root = new XElement("Root", stringArray); Console.WriteLine(root); // XElement object array content: XElement[] ellArray = { new XElement("NewChild1", 1), new XElement("NewChild2", 2), new XElement("NewChild3", 3) }; root = new XElement("Root", ellArray); Console.WriteLine(root); // XAttribute object array content: XAttribute[] attArray = { new XAttribute("NewAtt1", 1), new XAttribute("NewAtt2", 2), new XAttribute("NewAtt3", 3) }; root = new XElement("Root", attArray); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement ' String content: root = Some text Console.WriteLine(root) ' XElement object content: root = n Console.WriteLine(root) ' XAttribute object content: root = Console.WriteLine(root) ' Double content: Dim dbl As Double = 12.345 root = <%= dbl %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' DateTime content: Dim dt As DateTime = New DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0) root = <%= dt %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' String array content: ' Any collection other than a collection of XElement or XAttribute objects ' are converted to strings. The strings are concatenated and added. Dim stringArray As String() = { _ "abc", _ "def", _ "ghi" _ } root = <%= stringArray %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' XElement object array content: Dim ellArray As XElement() = { _ 1, _ 2, _ 3 _ } root = <%= ellArray %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' XAttribute object array content Dim attArray As XAttribute() = { _ New XAttribute("NewAtt1", 1), _ New XAttribute("NewAtt2", 2), _ New XAttribute("NewAtt3", 3) _ } root = <%= attArray %> Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Some text n 12.345 2006-10-06T12:30:00 abcdefghi 1 2 3 ``` 下列範例會建立命名空間中的 XML 樹狀結構。The following example creates an XML tree in a namespace. ```csharp // Create an XML tree in a namespace. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XElement(aw + "Child", "child content") ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb ' Create an XML tree in a namespace. Dim root As XElement = _ child content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml child content ``` 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構包含巢狀命名空間。The following example creates an XML tree with nested namespaces. ```csharp // Create an XML tree with nested namespaces. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XNamespace fc = "www.fourthcoffee.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XElement(fc + "Child", new XElement(aw + "DifferentChild", "other content") ) ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb ' Create an XML tree with nested namespaces. Dim root As XDocument = _ other content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml other content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回集合中的項目會以反向的文件順序。The elements in the returned collection are in reverse document order. 這個方法會使用延後的執行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構。The following example creates an XML tree. 然後尋找`GrandChild`項目，然後再列印它的上階。It then finds the `GrandChild` element, and then prints the ancestors of it. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", new XElement("GrandChild", "element content") ) ); XElement gc = xmlTree.Element("Child").Element("GrandChild"); IEnumerable aas = from el in gc.AncestorsAndSelf() select el; foreach (XElement el in aas) Console.WriteLine(el.Name); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ element content Dim GC As XElement = xmlTree..(0) Dim aas As IEnumerable(Of XElement) = _ From el In GC.AncestorsAndSelf() _ Select el For Each el In aas Console.WriteLine(el.Name) Next ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` GrandChild Child Root ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有些會傳回項目或屬性的集合。Some return collections of elements or attributes. 這個方法會傳回單一屬性。This method returns only a single attribute. 有時候這指*單一*(相對於*集合*)。Sometimes this is referred to as a *singleton* (in contrast to a *collection*). Visual Basic 使用者可以使用整合式的屬性軸，以擷取具有指定名稱之屬性的值。Visual Basic users can use the integrated attribute axis to retrieve the value of an attribute with a specified name. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有屬性的元素。The following example creates an element with an attribute. 然後，它會擷取使用此方法的屬性。It then retrieves the attribute using this method. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", "attribute content") ); XAttribute att = xmlTree.Attribute("Att"); Console.WriteLine(att); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = xmlTree.Attribute("Att") Console.WriteLine(att) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Att="attribute content" ``` 以下是相同的範例，但在此情況下 XML 位於命名空間。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement xmlTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XAttribute(aw + "Att", "attribute content") ); XAttribute att = xmlTree.Attribute(aw + "Att"); Console.WriteLine(att); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim xmlTree As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = xmlTree.Attribute(GetXmlNamespace(aw) + "Att") Console.WriteLine(att) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` aw:Att="attribute content" ```

IEnumerable attList = from at in xmlTree.Attributes() select at; foreach (XAttribute att in attList) Console.WriteLine(att); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = Dim attList As IEnumerable(Of XAttribute) = _ From at In xmlTree.Attributes() _ Select at For Each att In attList Console.WriteLine(att) Next ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Att1="content1" Att2="content2" ``` 以下是相同的範例，但在此情況下 XML 位於命名空間。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement xmlTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(aw + "Att1", "content1"), new XAttribute(aw + "Att2", "content2"), new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com") ); IEnumerable attList = from at in xmlTree.Attributes() select at; foreach (XAttribute att in attList) Console.WriteLine(att); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim xmlTree As XElement = Dim attList As IEnumerable(Of XAttribute) = _ From at In xmlTree.Attributes() _ Select at For Each att In attList Console.WriteLine(att) Next End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` aw:Att1="content1" aw:Att2="content2" xmlns:aw="http://www.adventure-works.com" ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間宣告可能會保存為 XML 樹狀結構中的屬性。Namespace declarations may be persisted as attributes in the XML tree. 這些特殊屬性宣告命名空間，包括預設的命名空間。These special attributes declare namespaces, including default namespaces. 這個方法會尋找命名空間宣告會宣告預設命名空間中，如果有的話，並傳回預設命名空間。This method finds the namespace declaration that declares the default namespace, if there is one, and returns the for the default namespace. 如果沒有宣告預設命名空間的屬性，則這個方法會傳回。If there is no attribute that declares the default namespace, then this method returns . 在建立 XML 樹狀結構，使用 C# 中，即使命名空間不會保存為屬性的 XML 樹狀結構中，就可使用預設命名空間中，序列化 XML 樹狀結構時，這個方法不會報告命名空間當做預設命名空間。When creating XML trees using C#, even if an XML tree would be serialized with a default namespace, if the namespace is not persisted in the XML tree as an attribute, this method will not report the namespace as the default namespace. 如果您使用匯入陳述式的預設命名空間中建立 XML，請建立使用 Visual Basic 和 XML 常值的 XML 樹狀結構，然後命名空間屬性將會建立在樹狀目錄中的 Visual Basic 編譯器，以及這個方法會報告該命名空間。When creating XML trees using Visual Basic and XML literals, if you create the XML in a default namespace using the Imports statement, then a namespace attribute will be created in the tree by the Visual Basic compiler, and this method will report that namespace. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有預設命名空間的 XML 樹狀結構。The following example creates an XML tree that has a default namespace. 然後，它會使用這個方法來擷取預設命名空間。It then uses this method to retrieve the default namespace. ```csharp String xml = ""; XElement e = XElement.Parse(xml); Console.WriteLine("Default namespace: {0}", e.GetDefaultNamespace()); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim e As XElement = Console.WriteLine("Default namespace: {0}", e.GetDefaultNamespace()) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Default namespace: http://www.adventure-works.com ```

returns.span: ，包含從指定之 讀取的 XML。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果來源 XML 縮排，則設定加上旗標`options`會使讀取器讀取來源 XML 中的所有空白字元。If the source XML is indented, setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to read all white space in the source XML. 節點類型供顯著和不顯著泛空白字元。Nodes of type are created for both significant and insignificant white space. 如果來源 XML 縮排，則未設定加上旗標`options`導致略過不顯著泛空白字元來源 XML 中的所有讀取器。If the source XML is indented, not setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to ignore all of the insignificant white space in the source XML. 建立 XML 樹狀結構沒有任何的無意義的空格的文字節點。The XML tree is created without any text nodes for insignificant white space. 如果找不到縮排的 XML 的來源，則設定加上旗標`options`沒有任何作用。If the source XML is not indented, setting the flag in `options` has no effect. 顯著泛空白字元仍會保留下來，並沒有無意義的空格可能會導致更多的泛空白字元文字節點建立的合併。Significant white space is still preserved, and there are no spans of insignificant white space that could cause the creation of more white space text nodes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). 使用建立從包含 XML 的字串。Use to create an from a string that contains XML. 設定從載入時，會有任何作用。Setting will have no effect when loading from a . 如果您將會對效能帶來負面影響旗標。There is a performance penalty if you set the flag. 程式行資訊正確無誤之後立即載入 XML 文件。The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果您修改 XML 樹狀結構載入文件之後，行資訊可能會沒有意義。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless. LINQ XML 的載入功能建置在。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和讀取和剖析文件的方法。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下列範例會載入從方式有兩種： 保留空白字元，和不保留空白字元。The following example loads an from a in two different ways: preserving white space, and not preserving white space. 然後會使用查詢來判斷結果 XML 樹狀結構中的泛空白字元節點的數目。It then uses a query to determine the number of white space nodes in the resulting XML tree. ```csharp TextReader sr; int whiteSpaceNodes; sr = new StringReader(" "); XElement xmlTree1 = XElement.Load(sr, LoadOptions.None); sr.Close(); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree1 .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); sr = new StringReader(" "); XElement xmlTree2 = XElement.Load(sr, LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); sr.Close(); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); ``` ```vb Dim sr As TextReader Dim whiteSpaceNodes As Integer sr = New StringReader(" ") Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = XElement.Load(sr, LoadOptions.None) sr.Close() whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree1 _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode.ToString().Trim().Length = 0) _ .Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) sr = New StringReader(" ") Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = XElement.Load(sr, LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) sr.Close() whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode.ToString().Trim().Length = 0) _ .Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): 0 Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): 3 ``` 下列範例會載入行資訊載入從。The following example loads the line information as it loads from the . 接著，它會列印行資訊。It then prints the line information. ```csharp TextReader sr = new StringReader( @" "); XElement po = XElement.Load(sr, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "Element Name".PadRight(20), "Line".PadRight(5), "Position"); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "------------".PadRight(20), "----".PadRight(5), "--------"); foreach (XElement e in po.DescendantsAndSelf()) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) + e.Name).PadRight(20), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LinePosition); ``` ```vb Dim sr As TextReader = New StringReader( _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ "") Dim po As XElement = XElement.Load(sr, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "Element Name".PadRight(20), _ "Line".PadRight(5), _ "Position") Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "------------".PadRight(20), _ "----".PadRight(5), _ "--------") For Each e As XElement In po.DescendantsAndSelf() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) & e.Name.ToString).PadRight(20), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LinePosition) Next ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Element Name Line Position ------------ ---- -------- Root 1 2 Child 2 4 GrandChild1 3 6 GrandChild2 4 6 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果來源 XML 縮排，則設定加上旗標`options`會使讀取器讀取來源 XML 中的所有空白字元。If the source XML is indented, setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to read all white space in the source XML. 節點類型供顯著和不顯著泛空白字元。Nodes of type are created for both significant and insignificant white space. 如果來源 XML 縮排，則未設定加上旗標`options`導致略過不顯著泛空白字元來源 XML 中的所有讀取器。If the source XML is indented, not setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to ignore all of the insignificant white space in the source XML. 建立 XML 樹狀結構沒有任何的無意義的空格的文字節點。The XML tree is created without any text nodes for insignificant white space. 如果找不到縮排的 XML 的來源，則設定加上旗標`options`沒有任何作用。If the source XML is not indented, setting the flag in `options` has no effect. 顯著泛空白字元仍會保留下來，並沒有無意義的空格可能會導致更多的泛空白字元文字節點建立的合併。Significant white space is still preserved, and there are no spans of insignificant white space that could cause the creation of more white space text nodes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). 使用建立從包含 XML 的字串。Use to create an from a string that contains XML. 如果您將會對效能帶來負面影響和旗標。There is a performance penalty if you set the and the flags. 基底 URI 與行資訊正確後立即載入 XML 文件。The base URI and the line information are accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果您修改 XML 樹狀結構之後載入文件，基底 URI 和行資訊可能會沒有意義。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the base URI and line information may become meaningless. LINQ XML 的載入功能建置在。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和讀取和剖析文件的方法。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下列範例會載入中兩個不同的方式從檔案： 保留空白字元，和不保留空白字元。The following example loads an from a file in two different ways: preserving white space, and not preserving white space. 然後會使用查詢來判斷結果 XML 樹狀結構中的泛空白字元節點的數目。It then uses a query to determine the number of white space nodes in the resulting XML tree. ```csharp XElement xmlTree1 = XElement.Parse(" ", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); xmlTree1.Save("Tree.xml"); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree1); int whiteSpaceNodes; XElement xmlTree2 = XElement.Load("Tree.xml", LoadOptions.None); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); XElement xmlTree3 = XElement.Load("Tree.xml", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree3 .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = XElement.Parse(" ", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) xmlTree1.Save("Tree.xml") Console.WriteLine(xmlTree1) Dim whiteSpaceNodes As Integer Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = XElement.Load("Tree.xml", LoadOptions.None) whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode.ToString().Trim().Length = 0) _ .Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) Dim xmlTree3 As XElement = XElement.Load("Tree.xml", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree3 _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode.ToString().Trim().Length = 0) _ .Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): 0 Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): 3 ``` 載入檔案時，下列範例會載入基底 URI 和行資訊。The following example loads the base URI and line information as it loads the file. 接著，它會列印的基底 URI 和行資訊。It then prints the base URI and the line information. 這個範例會使用下列資源檔：[範例 XML 檔： 典型採購訂單 (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0606c09f-6e43-4f8d-95c8-e8e2e08d2348)。This example uses the following resource file: [Sample XML File: Typical Purchase Order (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0606c09f-6e43-4f8d-95c8-e8e2e08d2348). ```csharp XElement po = XElement.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml", LoadOptions.SetBaseUri | LoadOptions.SetLineInfo); string[] splitUri = po.BaseUri.Split('/'); Console.WriteLine("BaseUri: {0}", splitUri[splitUri.Length - 1]); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "Element Name".PadRight(20), "Line".PadRight(5), "Position"); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "------------".PadRight(20), "----".PadRight(5), "--------"); foreach (XElement e in po.DescendantsAndSelf()) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) + e.Name).PadRight(20), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LinePosition); ``` ```vb Dim po As XElement = XElement.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml", LoadOptions.SetBaseUri Or LoadOptions.SetLineInfo) Dim splitUri() As String = po.BaseUri.Split("/") Console.WriteLine("BaseUri: {0}", splitUri(splitUri.Length - 1)) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "Element Name".PadRight(20), _ "Line".PadRight(5), _ "Position") Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "------------".PadRight(20), _ "----".PadRight(5), _ "--------") For Each e As XElement In po.DescendantsAndSelf() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) & e.Name.ToString()).PadRight(20), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LinePosition) Next ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` BaseUri: PurchaseOrder.xml Element Name Line Position ------------ ---- -------- PurchaseOrder 2 2 Address 3 4 Name 4 6 Street 5 6 City 6 6 State 7 6 Zip 8 6 Country 9 6 Address 11 4 Name 12 6 Street 13 6 City 14 6 State 15 6 Zip 16 6 Country 17 6 DeliveryNotes 19 4 Items 20 4 Item 21 6 ProductName 22 8 Quantity 23 8 USPrice 24 8 Comment 25 8 Item 27 6 ProductName 28 8 Quantity 29 8 USPrice 30 8 ShipDate 31 8 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由建立從 DOM 文件，然後將建立，這個方法可以用來建立 LINQ to XML 樹狀結構中的 DOM 文件的複本。By creating an from a DOM document, and then using the to create an , this method can be used to create a copy of a DOM document in a LINQ to XML tree. 使用建立從包含 XML 的字串。Use to create an from a string that contains XML. 設定無效，無法從載入時。Setting is not valid when loading from a . 或不會設定為其中一個讀取的空白字元。The will be configured to either read whitespace or not. LINQ to XML 樹狀結構將會填入泛空白字元節點的讀取器介面。The LINQ to XML tree will be populated with the whitespace nodes that the reader surfaces. 這是不論是否行為或未設定。This will be the behavior regardless of whether is set or not. 或不可能有有效的基底 URI。The may have a valid base URI or not. 如果您設定，基底 URI 將 XML 樹狀結構中所報告的基底 URI 從。If you set , the base URI will be set in the XML tree from the base URI that is reported by the . 或不可能有有效的線條資訊。The may have a valid line information or not. 如果您設定，行資訊將 XML 樹狀結構中所報告的行資訊從。If you set , the line information will be set in the XML tree from the line information that is reported by the . 如果您將會對效能帶來負面影響旗標。There is a performance penalty if you set the flag. 程式行資訊正確無誤之後立即載入 XML 文件。The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果您修改 XML 樹狀結構載入文件之後，行資訊可能會沒有意義。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless. LINQ XML 的載入功能建置在。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和讀取和剖析文件的方法。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下列範例會載入它從載入的行資訊。The following example loads the line information that it loads from the . 接著，它會列印行資訊。It then prints the line information. ```csharp string markup = @" "; // Create a reader and move to the content. using (XmlReader nodeReader = XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(markup))) { // the reader must be in the Interactive state in order to // Create a LINQ to XML tree from it. nodeReader.MoveToContent(); XElement xRoot = XElement.Load(nodeReader, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "Element Name".PadRight(20), "Line".PadRight(5), "Position"); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "------------".PadRight(20), "----".PadRight(5), "--------"); foreach (XElement e in xRoot.DescendantsAndSelf()) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) + e.Name).PadRight(20), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LinePosition); } ``` ```vb Dim markup As String = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ "" ' Create a reader and move to the content. Using nodeReader As XmlReader = XmlReader.Create(New StringReader(markup)) ' the reader must be in the Interactive state in order to ' Create a LINQ to XML tree from it. nodeReader.MoveToContent() Dim xRoot As XElement = XElement.Load(nodeReader, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "Element Name".PadRight(20), _ "Line".PadRight(5), _ "Position") Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "------------".PadRight(20), _ "----".PadRight(5), _ "--------") For Each e As XElement In xRoot.DescendantsAndSelf() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) & e.Name.ToString).PadRight(20), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LinePosition) Next End Using ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Element Name Line Position ------------ ---- -------- Root 1 2 Child 2 6 GrandChild 3 10 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性將會引發和事件。Setting this property will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例會使用這個屬性來判斷項目的名稱。The following example uses this property to determine the name of an element. ```csharp XElement el1 = new XElement("Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(el1.Name); XNamespace ns = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement el2 = new XElement(ns + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(el2.Name); Console.WriteLine(el2.Name.Namespace); Console.WriteLine(el2.Name.LocalName); el2.Name = ns + "NewName"; Console.WriteLine(el2.Name); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim el1 As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(el1.Name) Dim el2 As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(el2.Name) Console.WriteLine(el2.Name.Namespace) Console.WriteLine(el2.Name.LocalName) Dim aw as XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace(aw) el2.Name = aw + "NewName" Console.WriteLine(el2.Name) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Root {http://www.adventure-works.com}Root http://www.adventure-works.com Root {http://www.adventure-works.com}NewName ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為所有的類別，衍生自包含屬性，您可以撰寫程式碼的運作方式的具體子類別的集合。Because all classes that derive from contain a property, you can write code that operates on collections of concrete subclass of . 然後在集合中每個節點的節點型別可以測試您的程式碼。Your code can then test for the node type of each node in the collection. ## Examples 下列範例會使用這個屬性來列印節點類型的項目。The following example uses this property to print the node type of an element. ```csharp XElement el1 = new XElement("Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(el1.NodeType); Console.WriteLine(); ``` ```vb Dim el1 As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(el1.NodeType.ToString()) Console.WriteLine() ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Element ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當轉換成屬性或項目，從允許的值為"0"、"1"，與任何字串，會產生"true"或"false"修剪後轉換為小寫。When converting to from an attribute or element, allowed values are "0", "1", and any string that produces "true" or "false" after trimming and conversion to lower case. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有布林值的某些項目。The following example creates some elements with boolean values. 然後將轉換它們。It then casts them to . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("BoolValue1", true), new XElement("BoolValue2", false) ); bool bool1 = (bool)root.Element("BoolValue1"); bool bool2 = (bool)root.Element("BoolValue2"); Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue1={0}", bool1); Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue2={0}", bool2); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ true false Dim bool1 As Boolean = CBool(root.Element("BoolValue1")) Dim bool2 As Boolean = CBool(root.Element("BoolValue2")) Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue1={0}", bool1) Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue2={0}", bool2) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` (bool)BoolValue1=True (bool)BoolValue2=False ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性或項目，其中包含日期和時間內容的值空間是與密切相關的日期和時間以 ISO 8601 所述。The value space of an attribute or element that contains date and time content is closely related to the dates and times described in ISO 8601. 建立屬性或項目，其中包含日期和時間內容時，根據 W3C 規格格式化屬性或項目值。When creating an attribute or element that contains date and time content, the attribute or element values are formatted per the W3C specification. W3C 規格，如需詳細資訊，請參閱。See the W3C specification for more details. 若要進行轉換時，行為是 lax從屬性或項目。Behavior is lax when casting to a from an attribute or element. 即使屬性或項目值的格式不完全是依據 W3C 規格，值會適當地轉換成。Even if the attribute or element value is not formatted exactly per the W3C specification, the value is appropriately converted to a . 此轉換運算子會使用轉換。This conversion operator uses to convert from a . ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有日期和時間內容的元素。The following example creates an element with date and time content. 它然後將它轉換成来擷取其值。It then casts it to to retrieve the value. ```csharp // Behavior is strict when formatting an XML element or attribute from a DateTime, // but behavior is lax when casting to a DateTime from an element or attribute. XElement root = new XElement("Root", new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0)); Console.WriteLine(root); // Cast from a strictly formatted XML element. DateTime dt = (DateTime)root; Console.WriteLine("dt={0}", dt); Console.WriteLine("-----"); // If root is formatted in some different way: XElement dtElement = new XElement("OrderDate", "October 6, 2006"); Console.WriteLine(dtElement); DateTime orderDate = (DateTime)dtElement; Console.WriteLine("orderDate={0:d}", orderDate); ``` ```vb ' Behavior is strict when formatting an XML element or attribute from a DateTime, ' but behavior is lax when casting to a DateTime from an element or attribute. Dim root As XElement = <%= New DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0) %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' Cast from a strictly formatted XML element. Dim dt As DateTime = CType(root, DateTime) Console.WriteLine("dt={0}", dt) Console.WriteLine("-----") ' If root is formatted in some different way: Dim dtElement As XElement = October 6, 2006 Console.WriteLine(dtElement) Dim orderDate As DateTime = CType(dtElement, DateTime) Console.WriteLine("orderDate={0:d}", orderDate) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 2006-10-06T12:30:00 dt=10/6/2006 12:30:00 PM ----- October 6, 2006 orderDate=10/6/2006 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當轉換成的屬性或項目，從允許的值為"0"、"1"，與任何字串，會產生"true"或"false"修剪後轉換為小寫。When converting to of from an attribute or element, allowed values are "0", "1", and any string that produces "true" or "false" after trimming and conversion to lower case. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有布林值內容的元素。The following example creates an element with boolean content. 然後會擷取的值轉換為的。It then retrieves the value by casting to of . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("BoolValue1", true), new XElement("BoolValue2", false)); bool? bool1 = (bool?)root.Element("BoolValue1"); bool? bool2 = (bool?)root.Element("BoolValue2"); Console.WriteLine("Nullable Boolean: value1={0}", bool1); Console.WriteLine("Nullable Boolean: value2={0}", bool2); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ true false Dim value1 As Nullable(Of Boolean) = CType(root.Element("BoolValue1"), Nullable(Of Boolean)) Dim value2 As Nullable(Of Boolean) = CType(root.Element("BoolValue2"), Nullable(Of Boolean)) Console.WriteLine("Nullable Boolean: value1={0}", IIf(value1.HasValue, value1.ToString(), "null")) Console.WriteLine("Nullable Boolean: value2={0}", IIf(value2.HasValue, value2.ToString(), "null")) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Nullable Boolean: value1=True Nullable Boolean: value2=False ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性或項目，其中包含日期和時間內容的值空間是與密切相關的日期和時間以 ISO 8601 所述。The value space of an attribute or element that contains date and time content is closely related to the dates and times described in ISO 8601. 建立屬性或項目，其中包含日期和時間內容時，根據 W3C 規格格式化屬性或項目值。When creating an attribute or element that contains date and time content, the attribute or element values are formatted per the W3C specification. W3C 規格，如需詳細資訊，請參閱。See the W3C specification for more details. 若要進行轉換時，則行為是 lax的從屬性或項目。The behavior is lax when casting to a of from an attribute or element. 即使屬性或項目值的格式不完全是依據 W3C 規格，值會適當地轉換成的。Even if the attribute or element value is not formatted exactly per the W3C specification, the value is appropriately converted to a of . 此轉換運算子會使用轉換。This conversion operator uses to convert from a . ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有日期和時間內容的元素。The following example creates an element with a date and time as content. 然後會擷取的值轉換為的。It then retrieves the value by casting to of . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Value", new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0)) ); DateTime? value = (DateTime?)root.Element("Value"); Console.WriteLine("Nullable DateTime: value={0}", value == null ? "null" : value.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ <%= New DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0) %> Dim value As Nullable(Of DateTime) = CType(root.Element("Value"), Nullable(Of DateTime)) Console.WriteLine("Nullable DateTime: value={0}", IIf(value.HasValue, value.ToString(), "null")) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Nullable DateTime: value=10/6/2006 12:30:00 PM ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會保留泛空白字元。This method does not preserve white space. 如果您想要保留 XML 樹狀結構中的空白字元，使用的多載採用方法做為參數。If you want to preserve white space in the XML tree, use the overload of the method that takes as a parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). LINQ XML 的載入功能建置在。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和讀取和剖析文件的方法。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含 XML 的字串。The following example creates a string that contains XML. 然後它會剖析字串插入。It then parses the string into an . ```csharp XElement xmlTree = XElement.Parse(" "); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ```

span.span: A that contains XML.

param.name: options
param.span: ，其指定泛空白字元 (White Space) 的行為，以及是否要載入基底 URI 和行資訊。

span.span: A that specifies white space behavior, and whether to load base URI and line information.

summary.span: 從包含 XML 的字串載入 ，並選擇性地保留泛空白字元和程式行資訊。

span.span: Load an from a string that contains XML, optionally preserving white space and retaining line information.

returns.span: 從包含 XML 的字串填入的 。

span.span: An populated from the string that contains XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果來源 XML 縮排，則設定加上旗標`options`會使讀取器讀取來源 XML 中的所有空白字元。If the source XML is indented, setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to read all white space in the source XML. 節點類型供顯著和不顯著泛空白字元。Nodes of type are created for both significant and insignificant white space. 如果來源 XML 縮排，則未設定加上旗標`options`導致略過不顯著泛空白字元來源 XML 中的所有讀取器。If the source XML is indented, not setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to ignore all of the insignificant white space in the source XML. 建立 XML 樹狀結構沒有任何的無意義的空格的文字節點。The XML tree is created without any text nodes for insignificant white space. 如果找不到縮排的 XML 的來源，則設定加上旗標`options`沒有任何作用。If the source XML is not indented, setting the flag in `options` has no effect. 顯著泛空白字元仍會保留下來，並沒有無意義的空格可能會導致更多的泛空白字元文字節點建立的合併。Significant white space is still preserved, and there are no spans of insignificant white space that could cause the creation of more white space text nodes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). 設定從剖析時，會有任何作用。Setting will have no effect when parsing from a . 或不可能有有效的線條資訊。The may have a valid line information or not. 如果您設定，行資訊將 XML 樹狀結構中所報告的行資訊從。If you set , the line information will be set in the XML tree from the line information that is reported by the . 如果您將會對效能帶來負面影響旗標。There is a performance penalty if you set the flag. 程式行資訊正確無誤之後立即載入 XML 文件。The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果您修改 XML 樹狀結構載入文件之後，行資訊可能會沒有意義。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless. LINQ XML 的載入功能建置在。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和讀取和剖析文件的方法。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下列範例將字串剖析成方式有兩種： 保留空白字元，和不保留空白字元。The following example parses a string into an in two different ways: preserving white space, and not preserving white space. 然後會使用查詢來判斷結果 XML 樹狀結構中的泛空白字元節點的數目。It then uses a query to determine the number of white space nodes in the resulting XML tree. ```csharp int whiteSpaceNodes; XElement xmlTree1 = XElement.Parse(" ", LoadOptions.None); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree1 .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); XElement xmlTree2 = XElement.Parse(" ", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); ``` ```vb Dim whiteSpaceNodes As Integer Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = XElement.Parse(" ", LoadOptions.None) whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree1 _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode.ToString().Trim().Length = 0) _ .Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = XElement.Parse(" ", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode.ToString().Trim().Length = 0) _ .Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): 0 Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): 3 ``` 下列範例會保留列資訊，因為它會剖析字串。The following example retains line information as it parses the string. ```csharp string markup = @" "; XElement xRoot = XElement.Parse(markup, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "Element Name".PadRight(20), "Line".PadRight(5), "Position"); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "------------".PadRight(20), "----".PadRight(5), "--------"); foreach (XElement e in xRoot.DescendantsAndSelf()) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) + e.Name).PadRight(20), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LinePosition); ``` ```vb Dim markup As String = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim xRoot As XElement = XElement.Parse(markup, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "Element Name".PadRight(20), _ "Line".PadRight(5), _ "Position") Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "------------".PadRight(20), _ "----".PadRight(5), _ "--------") For Each e As XElement In xRoot.DescendantsAndSelf() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) & e.Name.ToString).PadRight(20), _ DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), _ DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo).LinePosition) Next ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Element Name Line Position ------------ ---- -------- Root 1 2 Child 2 6 GrandChild 3 10 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會引發和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例會建立與屬性和子元素的元素。The following example creates an element with attributes and child elements. 然後，它會呼叫這個方法，以移除的屬性和子項目。It then calls this method to remove both the attributes and the child elements. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XAttribute("Att3", 3), new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3) ); root.RemoveAll(); // removes children elements and attributes of root Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ 1 2 3 root.RemoveAll() ' removes children elements and attributes of root Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會引發和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例會建立與屬性和子元素的元素。The following example creates an element with attributes and child elements. 然後，它會呼叫此方法來移除屬性。It then calls this method to remove the attributes. 保留子項目。The child elements remain. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XAttribute("Att3", 3), new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3) ); root.RemoveAttributes(); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ 1 2 3 root.RemoveAttributes() Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 2 3 ```

summary.span: 以指定的內容取代這個元素的子節點和屬性。

span.span: Replaces the child nodes and the attributes of this element with the specified content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用快照集的語意，也就是說，它會建立個別複製新內容再以新的內容取代目前的項目內容。This method uses snapshot semantics—that is, it creates a separate copy of the new content before replacing the contents of the current element with the new content. 這表示您可以查詢的目前項目內容和查詢的結果做為指定的新內容。This means that you can query the contents of the current element and use the results of the query as the specified new content. 如需可以傳遞至這個函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 這個方法會引發和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例會將 LINQ 查詢的結果傳遞至這個方法，以查詢結果取代項目的內容。The following example passes the results of a LINQ query to this method, replacing the contents of an element with the query results. 它會查詢有取代其內容的項目。It queries the element that is having its contents replaced. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Data", 1), new XElement("Data", 2), new XElement("Data", 3), new XElement("Data", 4), new XElement("Data", 5) ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); Console.WriteLine("-----"); xmlTree.ReplaceAll( from el in xmlTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select new XElement("NewData", (int)el) ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) Console.WriteLine("-----") xmlTree.ReplaceAll( _ From el In xmlTree.Elements _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 1 2 3 4 5 ----- 3 4 5 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會先移除現有的內容和屬性。This method first removes existing content and attributes. 接著它會加入指定`content`。It then adds the specified `content`. 這個方法會使用快照集的語意，也就是說，它會建立個別複製新內容再以新的內容取代目前的項目內容。This method uses snapshot semantics—that is, it creates a separate copy of the new content before replacing the contents of the current element with the new content. 這表示您可以查詢的目前項目內容和查詢的結果做為指定的新內容。This means that you can query the contents of the current element and use the results of the query as the specified new content. 如需可以傳遞至這個函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 這個方法會引發和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例會將 LINQ 查詢的結果傳遞至這個方法，以查詢結果取代項目的內容。The following example passes the results of a LINQ query to this method, replacing the contents of an element with the query results. ```csharp XElement xmlTree1 = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5), new XElement("Child6", 6) ); XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", "child content") ); root.ReplaceAll( from el in xmlTree1.Elements() where((int)el >= 3 && (int)el <= 5) select el ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim root As XElement = child content root.ReplaceAll( _ From el In xmlTree1.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 And el.Value <= 5 _ Select el _ ) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會引發和事件。This method will raise the and the events. 如需可以傳遞至這個函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有三個屬性的元素。The following example creates an element with three attributes. 然後，它會使用這個方法以取代單一屬性的所有項目的屬性。It then uses this method to replace all of the attributes of the element with a single attribute. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XAttribute("Att3", 3) ); root.ReplaceAttributes( new XAttribute("NewAtt1", 101) ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = root.ReplaceAttributes(New XAttribute("NewAtt1", 101)) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會先移除現有的屬性。This method first removes existing attributes. 接著它會加入指定`content`。It then adds the specified `content`. 如需可以傳遞至這個函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 這個方法會引發和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有三個屬性的元素。The following example creates an element with three attributes. 然後，它會取代的屬性與其他屬性。It then replaces the attributes with other attributes. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XAttribute("Att3", 3) ); root.ReplaceAttributes( new XAttribute("NewAtt1", 101), new XAttribute("NewAtt2", 102), new XAttribute("NewAtt3", 103) ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = root.ReplaceAttributes( _ New XAttribute("NewAtt1", 101), _ New XAttribute("NewAtt2", 102), _ New XAttribute("NewAtt3", 103)) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將縮排序列化的 XML。The serialized XML will be indented. 將會移除所有無意義的空格，並會加入額外的空白字元，如此會適當地縮排的 XML。All insignificant white space will be removed, and additional white space will be added so that the XML will be properly indented. 這個方法的行為是將不會保留不顯著泛空白字元。The behavior of this method is that insignificant white space will not be preserved. 如果您想要控制空白字元，使用的多載採用做為參數。If you want to control white space, use the overload of that takes as a parameter. 使用將未縮排的 XML 儲存選項。Use the option to save unindented XML. 這會導致寫入器寫入所有空白完全 XML 樹狀結構中所示。This will cause the writer to write all white spaces exactly as represented in the XML tree. 使用選項，如果您想要移除重複的命名空間宣告。Use the option if you want to remove duplicate namespace declarations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將縮排序列化的 XML。The serialized XML will be indented. 將會移除所有無意義的空格，並會加入額外的空白字元，如此會適當地縮排的 XML。All insignificant white space will be removed, and additional white space will be added so that the XML will be properly indented. 這個方法的行為是將不會保留泛空白字元。The behavior of this method is that white space will not be preserved. 如果您想要控制空白字元，使用的多載，可讓您指定做為參數。If you want to control white space, use the overload of that allows you to specify as a parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下列範例會建立，將儲存的文件，然後列印到主控台的字串。The following example creates an , saves the document to a , and then prints the string to the console. ```csharp XElement root = XElement.Parse(@" Text "); using (StringWriter sw = new StringWriter()) { root.Save(sw); Console.WriteLine(sw.ToString()); } ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Text Using sw = New StringWriter() root.Save(sw) Console.WriteLine(sw.ToString()) End Using ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Text ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將縮排序列化的 XML。The serialized XML will be indented. 將會移除所有無意義的空格，並會加入額外的空白字元，如此會適當地縮排的 XML。All insignificant white space will be removed, and additional white space will be added so that the XML will be properly indented. 這個方法的行為是將不會保留 XML 樹狀結構中的節點的有效空白字元。The behavior of this method is that insignificant white space nodes in the XML tree will not be preserved. 如果您想要控制空白字元，使用的多載，可讓您指定做為參數。If you want to control white space, use the overload of that allows you to specify as a parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下列範例會建立，將文件儲存至檔案，然後列印到主控台檔案。The following example creates an , saves the document to a file, and then prints the file to the console. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", "child content") ); root.Save("Root.xml"); string str = File.ReadAllText("Root.xml"); Console.WriteLine(str); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ child content root.Save("Root.xml") Dim Str As String = File.ReadAllText("Root.xml") Console.WriteLine(Str) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml child content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設`options`設為。By default the `options` are set to . 此選項會移除所有多餘的不顯著泛空白字元，並將適當的無效空白字元，因此，XML 適當地縮排。This option will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented. 如果您想要儲存不縮排的 XML，指定旗標，以`options`。If you want to save unindented XML, specify the flag for `options`. 這會導致寫入器寫入所有空白完全 XML 樹狀結構中所示。This will cause the writer to write all white spaces exactly as represented in the XML tree. 使用選項，如果您想要移除重複的命名空間宣告。Use option if you want to remove duplicate namespace declarations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要儲存不縮排的 XML，指定旗標，以`options`。If you want to save unindented XML, specify the flag for `options`. 這會導致寫入器寫入的所有空白字元完全 XML 樹狀結構中所示。This will cause the writer to write all white space exactly as represented in the XML tree. 如果您想要儲存縮排的 XML，未指定旗標，以`options`。If you want to save indented XML, do not specify the flag for `options`. 這會移除所有多餘的不顯著泛空白字元，並將適當的無效空白字元，因此，XML 適當地縮排。This will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented. 這是預設行為，以及多載的行為方法不接受`options`做為參數。This is the default behavior, and the behavior of the overloads of the methods that do not take `options` as a parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下列範例會示範這個方法的兩種用法。The following example shows two uses of this method. 第一次使用保留泛空白字元。The first use preserves white space. 第二個序列化格式。The second serializes the with formatting. 文件不有任何空格所建構，因為保留泛空白字元輸出沒有縮排的 XML。Because the document has no white space in it as constructed, preserving white space outputs the XML without any indenting. ```csharp XElement root = XElement.Parse(@" Text "); using (StringWriter sw = new StringWriter()) { root.Save(sw, SaveOptions.DisableFormatting); Console.WriteLine(sw.ToString()); } Console.WriteLine("====="); using (StringWriter sw = new StringWriter()) { root.Save(sw, SaveOptions.None); Console.WriteLine(sw.ToString()); } ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Text Using sw = New StringWriter() root.Save(sw, SaveOptions.DisableFormatting) Console.WriteLine(sw.ToString()) End Using Console.WriteLine("=====") Using sw = New StringWriter() root.Save(sw, SaveOptions.None) Console.WriteLine(sw.ToString()) End Using ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Text ===== Text ```

span.span: Serialize this element to a file, optionally disabling formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要儲存不縮排的 XML，指定旗標，以`options`。If you want to save unindented XML, specify the flag for `options`. 這會導致寫入器寫入的所有空白字元完全 XML 樹狀結構中所示。This will cause the writer to write all white space exactly as represented in the XML tree. 如果您想要儲存縮排的 XML，未指定旗標，以`options`。If you want to save indented XML, do not specify the flag for `options`. 這會移除所有多餘的不顯著泛空白字元，並將適當的無效空白字元，因此，XML 適當地縮排。This will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented. 這是預設行為，以及多載的行為方法不接受`options`做為參數。This is the default behavior, and the behavior of the overloads of the methods that do not take `options` as a parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下列範例會示範這個方法的兩種用法。The following example shows two uses of this method. 第一次使用保留泛空白字元。The first use preserves white space. 第二個序列化格式。The second one serializes the with formatting. ```csharp string str; XElement root = XElement.Parse(@" Text "); root.Save("Root.xml", SaveOptions.DisableFormatting); str = File.ReadAllText("Root.xml"); Console.WriteLine(str); Console.WriteLine("====="); root.Save("Root.xml", SaveOptions.None); str = File.ReadAllText("Root.xml"); Console.WriteLine(str); ``` ```vb Dim str As String Dim root As XElement = Text root.Save("Root.xml", SaveOptions.DisableFormatting) str = File.ReadAllText("Root.xml") Console.WriteLine(str) Console.WriteLine("=====") root.Save("Root.xml", SaveOptions.None) str = File.ReadAllText("Root.xml") Console.WriteLine(str) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Text ===== Text ```

summary.span: 設定子元素的值、加入子元素或移除子元素。

span.span: Sets the value of a child element, adds a child element, or removes a child element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法被為了便於維護為子系項目的一組名稱/值組的清單。This method is designed to make it easy to maintain a list of name/value pairs as a set of children elements. 維護的清單，當您要加入、 修改組，或刪除組。When maintaining the list, you need to add pairs, modify pairs, or delete pairs. 如果您呼叫這個方法不存在的名稱傳遞做為子項目，這個方法會為您建立的子元素。If you call this method passing a name that does not exist as a child element, this method creates a child element for you. 如果您呼叫這個方法傳遞現有的子元素的名稱，這個方法會修改您指定的值的子元素的值。If you call this method passing the name of an existing child element, this method modifies the value of the child element to the value that you specify. 如果您要傳入`null`如`value`，這個方法會移除子項目。If you pass `null` for `value`, this method removes the child element. 這個方法會引發事件。This method will raise events. 將值指派至具有指定名稱的第一個子元素。The value is assigned to the first child element with the specified name. 如果沒有具有指定名稱的子系元素存在，則會加入新的子項目。If no child element with the specified name exists, a new child element is added. 如果值為 null，第一個子元素具有指定名稱，如果有的話，會刪除。If the value is null, the first child element with the specified name, if any, is deleted. 這個方法不會將子節點或屬性加入指定的子項目。This method does not add child nodes or attributes to the specified child element. 這個方法擲回例外狀況，如果任何物件，衍生自被當做`value`。This method throws an exception if any object that derives from is passed as `value`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[維護名稱/值組](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe9798bf-b5e2-4a3c-a86c-7f8638912691)。For more information, see [Maintaining Name/Value Pairs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe9798bf-b5e2-4a3c-a86c-7f8638912691). ## Examples 下列範例會建立與子元素的元素。The following example creates an element with a child element. 然後，它會使用這個方法來設定子項目的值。It then uses this method to set the value of the child element. ```csharp // Create an element with no content XElement root = new XElement("Root"); // Add some name/value pairs. root.SetElementValue("Ele1", 1); root.SetElementValue("Ele2", 2); root.SetElementValue("Ele3", 3); Console.WriteLine(root); // Modify one of the name/value pairs. root.SetElementValue("Ele2", 22); Console.WriteLine(root); // Remove one of the name/value pairs. root.SetElementValue("Ele3", null); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb ' Create an element with no content. Dim root As XElement = ' Add some name/value pairs. root.SetElementValue("Ele1", 1) root.SetElementValue("Ele2", 2) root.SetElementValue("Ele3", 3) Console.WriteLine(root) ' Modify one of the name/value pairs. root.SetElementValue("Ele2", 22) Console.WriteLine(root) ' Remove one of the name/value pairs. root.SetElementValue("Ele3", Nothing) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 1 2 3 1 22 3 1 22 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性，取得或設定項目的值。Using this property, you can get or set the value of an element. 設定這個屬性將會引發和事件。Setting this property will raise the and the events. 如果您想要取得項目的值，但您不確定它是否存在，則更方便使用的明確轉換運算子，並將指派給項目可為 null 的型別例如`string`或的。If you want to get the value of an element but you are not sure that it exists, it is more convenient to use the explicit conversion operators, and assign the element to a nullable type such as `string` or of . 如果項目不存在，可為 null 的型別會設定為`null`。If the element does not exist, the nullable type is set to `null`. 相反地，如果您想要使用這個屬性，您必須確定方法不會傳回`null`才能存取這個屬性。By contrast, if you want to use this property, you must make sure that the method does not return `null` before you access this property. ## Examples 下列範例會使用這個屬性，以擷取具有混合內容的項目文字。The following example uses this property to retrieve the text of an element with mixed content. ```csharp XElement el = XElement.Parse("This is mixed content"); Console.WriteLine("{0}", el.Value); ``` ```vb Dim el As XElement = This is mixed content Console.WriteLine("{0}", el.Value) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` This is mixed content ```

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何撰寫至。The following example shows how to write an to an . 請注意此範例並未撰寫 XML 宣告。Note that the example did not write an XML declaration. ```csharp StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(); XmlWriterSettings xws = new XmlWriterSettings(); xws.OmitXmlDeclaration = true; xws.Indent = true; using (XmlWriter xw = XmlWriter.Create(sb, xws)) { xw.WriteStartElement("Root"); XElement child1 = new XElement("Child", new XElement("GrandChild", "some content") ); child1.WriteTo(xw); XElement child2 = new XElement("AnotherChild", new XElement("GrandChild", "different content") ); child2.WriteTo(xw); xw.WriteEndElement(); } Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim sb As StringBuilder = New StringBuilder() Dim xws As XmlWriterSettings = New XmlWriterSettings() xws.OmitXmlDeclaration = True xws.Indent = True Using xw = XmlWriter.Create(sb, xws) xw.WriteStartElement("Root") Dim child1 As XElement = _ some content child1.WriteTo(xw) Dim child2 As XElement = _ different content child2.WriteTo(xw) xw.WriteEndElement() End Using Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml some content different content ```
